Html:
Hey guys,
Not sure if this is the right way but there is already a bug open for this but it was (partially fixed) but again broken in a recent commit.

See my issue here: https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/2048. After I reported the issue the definition was changed so I was hoping it would be fixed with the next release. But the commit changes it back like it was with the 0.9.5 version.

See commit: beb163ec1a72
This commit changes the declare var IDBKeyRange statement back to an interface (like it was with the 0.9.5 version).

Edit it was fixed by this commit from December 26 2013: 254bb12f4770150e83d13d556b76c9a399f3cca
